import 'styles/test.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from 'components/Header' import Sidebar from 'components/Sidebar' import glazes from 'data/glazes.json' import bases from 'data/bases.json' function App() { const [selectedGlaze, setSelectedGlaze] = useState({glaze: {id: "", base: "", additives : []}, base: {id: "", name: "", recipe : []}}); return (<>
  • About

  • Glazes
{glazes.map(glaze => { setSelectedGlaze({glaze: glaze, base: bases.find(base => (base.name === glaze.base))}) }} /> )}
) } export default App
